basics.name: Chris Pelatari
basics.label: Blue Fenix Productions
basics.summary: I'm an experienced software developer with over 2 decades experience crafting full-stack web and desktop applications using dotnet technologies including C# and VB.NET. Lately, I've been diving into TypeScript and Node.js, often paired with an ASP.NET Core backend. I'm also proud to be a former Microsoft MVP and a member of the AspInsiders community.

work.summary: At Blue Fenix Productions, I guide projects such as Cancer Couture, blending creative ideas with technology. These projects are a way to build reliable solutions while continually refining my technical skills.

At Cardinal Health, I spearheaded the modernization of legacy systems and led cross-functional teams to deliver high-impact digital transformation projects. I optimized system performance, integrated robust DevOps practices, and enhanced CI/CD workflows, significantly improving product reliability and operational efficiency.

At Velocity Databank, Inc., I started as an intern and steadily worked my way up to CTO over a 22-year journey. Along the way, I led initiatives that improved our operations and technology, always learning and growing with each challenge.

interests.name: Project-Based Services
keywords:
Your Vision. Our Expertise. Seamless Results.

Have a specific tech challenge or software development project in mind? At Blue Fenix Productions, we translate your goals into robust digital solutions—smoothly, swiftly, and stress-free.

Whether you’re launching a new app, upgrading your infrastructure, or modernizing existing systems, our senior-level engineers are ready to partner closely with your team to deliver precisely tailored solutions.

Let’s talk about your project and how we can help you succeed. Request your personalized quote today - clarity, confidence, and zero obligation.

interests.name: DevOps
keywords:
We are skilled in DevOps automation using YAML to define and manage CI/CD pipelines. Our proficiency with Azure DevOps, AWS CodePipeline, and GitHub Actions streamline deployments, enforce best practices, and enable robust infrastructure as code.

Hourly Rate: $150

interests.name: Frontend or Backend Development
keywords:
API development is a cornerstone of modern software architecture, enabling seamless integration, efficient scaling, and robust communication between services. Complemented by expert frontend development using Vue.js, React, Angular, Blazor, or Html5 I guarantee the right solution tailored precisely to the scale of your issue.

Hourly Rate: $150
